existing_features.title: Build a profile creation and editing form where users can input their name, age, bio, interests (as tags), and upload a profile photo
Create a card-based browsing interface displaying one profile at a time with photo, name, age, bio, and interests
Implement swipe or button-based like/pass interaction allowing users to express interest or skip profiles
Build a matches view showing all mutual matches with profile previews
Design a modern, romantic visual theme with warm colors, elegant typography, and smooth animations that create an inviting dating app experience
Build a messaging interface page where users can view their list of conversations with matched profiles and select one to open the chat view
Create a chat view component that displays conversation history with a matched user and provides an input field to send new messages
Build a photo feed page displaying posts from matched users in a grid or list layout, showing the photo, caption, poster's name, and timestamp
Create a photo posting component with image upload functionality and caption input that allows users to create and publish new photo posts
Add navigation links in the Layout component header for accessing the messages page and photo feed page

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model for user profiles including fields for name, age, bio, interests, and profile photo URL
Implement backend functions to create, read, update, and retrieve user profiles
Create a backend matching algorithm that suggests compatible profiles based on shared interests
Implement backend like/pass functionality where users can express interest or skip profiles
Add messaging functionality for users to communicate with their matches
Add photo posting feature where users can share photos
Create a backend data model for messages that includes sender principal, recipient principal, message text content, timestamp, and read status
Implement backend functions to send messages between matched users, retrieve conversation history between two users, and mark messages as read
Create a backend data model for user photo posts that includes the photo blob data, caption text, timestamp, and owner principal
Implement backend functions to create photo posts with captions, retrieve all posts from a specific user, and retrieve a feed of posts from matched users
